attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: MIT researchers have developed FragFold, a new computational method that predicts protein fragments for binding or inhibition of targets, promising advancements in biological research and therapy.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: ReviveMed, a MIT spinout, utilizes AI to analyze body metabolites to identify underlying disease drivers, offering potential for personalized therapeutic matches.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: China's electric vehicle manufacturers are increasingly investing in humanoid robot technology, illustrated by a recent gala performance featuring 16 robots, indicating a strategic pivot in their industry focus.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: New studies revealed that large language models can reason about various data types based on semantic understanding, highlighting advancements in AI's ability to process and interpret complex information.
